Package com.deco2800.game.components.player

Class TouchPlayerInputComponent

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.components.Component
com.deco2800.game.input.InputComponent
com.deco2800.game.components.player.TouchPlayerInputComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
GestureDetector.GestureListener, InputProcessor
public class TouchPlayerInputComponent
extends InputComponent
Input handler for the player for keyboard and touch (mouse) input. This input handler uses keyboard and touch input.
